text: [music]
[music]
My name is Agy Sternaki and I'm a game
balance designer on Fortnite Battle
Royale. A game balance designer is
basically the person who makes sure that
the game feels fun and fair to the most
amount of people possible. we can be as
[music]
insane as possible in the idea room to
make all of our features and our game in
general really accessible to a lot of
people and make it fun for as many
people as we can. That's what it's all
about in the games industry. We just
want to make things that people love.
What's interesting about being a balance
designer is that every day is pretty
different. I tend to refer to us as like
Swiss Army knives because we do a lot of
different things.
>> [music]
>> We do a lot of data analysis stuff. We
work with engineers, animators, effects
artists, etc. [music] So, it runs the
whole gamut. Like, that's probably one
of the more surprising things. Like,
you'd think that we'd be sitting there
like in an Excel spreadsheet, you know,
calculating numbers all day. We're not
trying to create perfect numbers. It's
not perfect math. It's what we think
will appeal to the player experience the
most. [music] This is my first full-time
job out of college, actually. So, that's
really lucky. And that doesn't always
happen, but sometimes it will. So, just
apply. Even if you don't think that you
have all the skills or if you don't meet
the criteria in the job description, you
never know who's going to take a chance
on you. No matter like what field you
want to get into, you can really gain a
lot of knowledge from trying to think
about what sort of decisions were made
in the game and for what reasons. And
having that knowledge is very valuable
later on when you're solving problems
within whatever role that you have.
>> [music]
